meanings: [명사] evasion, [동사] evade, avoid, dodge, (informal) sidestep, (의무·책임 등을) shirk, (formal) abdicate

vlive.korean: 저는 모든 질문의 회피용 대답을 배웠어요 - 뭐예요, 뭔데요? I learned to answer avoidantly to all sorts of questions. - What is it? 듣기 View video BTS : 태태 FM 6.13 🐯
vlive.english: I learned to answer avoidantly to all sorts of questions. - What is it?

vlive.korean: [시선 회피] 그냥... [Looking away] I just... 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP40. MAMA에 있지!
[대답 회피] 아니 어제 티 냈어? [Avoiding to answer] Did you make it obvious? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 좋아해주는 사람에게 마음이 움직일까? #고백하기_좋은_순간ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP11
vlive.english: [Avoiding to answer] Did you make it obvious?

vlive.korean: 이게 약간 좀 회피인가? Is this kind of avoiding it? 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 오랜만이에요!
vlive.english: Is this kind of avoiding it?

vlive.korean: [시선 회피] - 몰라~ 그냥 그리는거지 - 너 왜 나 안 쳐다봐? [Avoiding eye contact] - I don't know. I'm just drawing. - Why wouldn't you look at me? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 리하이 여자 출연자 3인방 드디어 모였어요!ㅣ지효의 깜짝 등장💖ㅣ[리얼하이VLOG] #6
vlive.english: [Avoiding eye contact] - I don't know. I'm just drawing. - Why wouldn't you look at me?

examples.korean: Did you notice how she neatly sidestepped the question? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀가 얼마나 교묘하게 그 질문을 회피하는지 봤어요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Did you notice how she neatly sidestepped the question? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’re just avoiding the issue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신은 그저 그 사안을 회피하고 있어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’re just avoiding the issue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They found a way of circumventing the law. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 그 법을 회피할 방법을 찾아내었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They found a way of circumventing the law. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She never shirked her responsibilities. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 책임을 회피하는 법이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She never shirked her responsibilities. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Not turning up was just a cop-out. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모습을 나타내지[그 자리에 오지] 않은 것은 그저 책임 회피였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Not turning up was just a cop-out. Add to Wordbook
